location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'GENERAL MAP OF FRENCH POSSESSIONS IN THE GULF OF ADEN.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 455 x 480mm, on sheet 510 x 565mm

mods.abstract: The map shows a region of eastern Africa extending inland from the coast of the Gulf of Aden, indicating main routes, uncertain routes and secondary routes. The map also indicates relief with form lines, hydrology, settlements and tribal regions.Sheet 'No. 885-I., 95.' appears in the lower margin, and a printing statement reads, 'Intelligence Branch. Topographical. Dy. No. 1,358. Exd. C.J.A., August 1895.'A hand stamp reads, 'Intelligence Division 15 Jan 1896'.
